title: Smart Data models - Compartment schema
description: Artificial area in a building or department that is measured by certain sensors. A compartment is not necessarily a physical separator. It can be a department or a grouping of several pens within a department that are being measured by the same sensor.

type.description: Property. NGSI Entity type. it has to be Compartment

additionalInfo.description: Property. list of all the raw values sent by the sensor/platform with all the possible extra properties that are not included in the main structure. It is a JSON structure similar to this: { 'temperature': '32', 'humidity':'42'}

arrivalTimestamp.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Datetime'. Date and Time at which the animal were inserted in the compartment

avgGrowth.description: Property. The average growth in weight of the animals in this compartment. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'.

avgWeight.description: Property. The average weight of the pigs in this compartment. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'

anyOf.description: Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity
Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity

buildingId.description: Relationship. Unique identifier of a building the compartment is located in

co2.description: Property. The CO2 concentration in the compartment

anyOf.description: Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity
Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity

companyId.description: Relationship. Unique identifier of a company

empty.description: Property. True/False value if the compartment is empty

anyOf.description: Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity
Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity

farmId.description: Relationship. Unique identifier of a farm where the compartment is located in

feedConsumption.description: Property. The total amount of food that has been eaten from the feeding station(s) in the compartment

humidity.description: Property. Quantity representing the amount of water vapour in the atmosphere in the compartment. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'

lastUpdate.description: Property. Date and time at which the measurements in the compartment were taken. Unix timestamp

luminosity.description: Property. The brightness of a light source of a certain wavelength at the compartment. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'

numAnimals.description: Property. Number of animals in the compartment. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'

anyOf.description: Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity
Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity

parentCompartmentId.description: Relationship. Unique identifier of the  compartment where this compartment is a part of. It is used only when a compartment contains other compartments

sex.description: Property. The sex of the animals contained in the compartment

waterConsumption.description: Property. The total amount of water that came out from the tap or taps in the compartment

weightStDev.description: Property. The standard deviation associated to the average weight of the pigs/piglets contained in the compartment
